title: LFM for cg open ladder team gold 1 +
body:
Looking for dedicated members to join team, need reliable people that are almost always online or play regularly, team has dedicated teamspeak server for matches and a Facebook page to notify members on matches/scrim times etc, myself (diamond 5 support) and my friend both have management experience in competitive lol , all competition expenses paid for as well. Currently looking for following roles : 

TOP LANER AND SUB
SUB MID LANER
JUNGLE AND SUB
SUB FOR ADC
SUB FOR SUPPORT

Please fill out the following

Name and ign

Age 

Role

State/province

Solo q ranking end of season 4 

Times of availability 

Trials will be held during the next couple of days

replies.body:
Name and ign - Jordan/Kousei

Age - 17

Role - Mid

State/province - Victoria

Solo q ranking end of season 4 - Gold

Times of availability - 9am- 9pm Most days
